enhanced_by.reason: The sendRequest method requires a socket to be added to the NetAccessManager before sending the request.
The sendRequest method should ensure that the request attributes are validated before sending the request.
The handleMessageEvent method can be used to handle the response received after sending the request, providing assertions for the response handling logic.
The sendResponse method can be used to assert the behavior of sending a response, which is similar to the sendRequest method in terms of network communication.
